name: The Horror Story: Remastered - The Prequel
name_original: The Horror Story: Remastered - The Prequel
description:
Welcome to The Horror Story, a remastered version from the original Horror Story powered by Unreal Engine 5. Collect an item to unlock the next level, and to proceed with "The Game", but be careful though. Someone may be lurking around in these levels.

There are 3 levels you need to beat in order to unlock the "secret bonus level". You will start off in the Basement. Look around to see if you can find an item you need to proceed. Then there's the Bush Maze. It's small, so you should be able to find the item pretty quickly. The last level is the Maze. You must find your way around the maze in order to find the item you need to proceed. The "Secret Bonus Level" is a secret, so complete all 3 levels to unlock it.

Will you be the one to beat it all... O R . B E . L I K E . T H E . R E S T . O F . T H E M . W H O . A R E . T R A P P E D . I N . T H E . L O O P ?

Like all horror games, it contains jumpscares, flashing lights, and loud noises.

Features:

  • Unlockable levels
  • Collectable items
  • Scary elements
  • 3 levels
  • 1 bonus level
